# <code>math ceil</code> for math

<div class='command-title'>Applies the ceil function to a list of numbers</div>

## Signature

```> math ceil```

## Flags

 * ```-h, --help```: Display this help message
## Examples

  Apply the ceil function to a list of numbers
```shell
  > [1.5 2.3 -3.1] | math ceil
```
